name: Time jump Escape room(vr)
description:
This game is currently actively being developed on the current state of the game will get its first update just after the game jam ends.

Things you kneed to know before playing at the time of submission I have not added any riddles so I will type the riddles here 

For the Study>>>>>>

Knowledge is power 

return what has been misplaced 

to complete the pattern.

For the Dining Room >>>>>>

Set the table for 6 

To light your way 

to a fiery grave

TO OPEN DOORS GRAB THE HANDEL SLIGHTLY TWIST THE REMOTE PUSH THE DOOR AND WALK FORWARD TO OPEN IT

IF A DOOR IS LOCKED IT WILL MAKE A LOCKED SOUND
